issue.title: [C++] Old versions of FindProtobuf.cmake use ALL-CAPS for variables
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4898](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4898). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We only need to handle `PROTOBUF_PROTOC_LIBRARY` vs `Protobuf_PROTOC_LIBRARY`.

comments.body:
